Text: any chance of getting the DTS 5.1 version?
Will both audio and video work on my LG 3d TV or my PS3? Sometimes I DL these huge files and the sound isnt supported.
huslnflo download MKV2AC3 run the file and it should play on your lg or if you have a 3d blueray player with a usb try that it works for me
Thanks thaitran!!! How do i get the audio track back into the video file once conversion is done?
it be one file because dts does not play on lg so it change it to ac3
is this converted 3d from blu ray or ripped from original 3d disc?

A 7
V 8

This is clearly from the original Bluray (as noted in the title) and not a conversion ...you can tell because during this movie many times 3D artifacts pop far out of the screen, which does not even come close to happening on conversions. HOWEVER the audio was Not DTS it was Dolby 5.1 on my Denon receiver. Still sounded wonderful though, but had to knock a couple of points off for that. Video was slightly grainy and colors were a little muted, but I am on a Sharp 80" screen so any variances in quality really stand out. Would be unnoticeable on a 60"or smaller screen from normal viewing distances. Overall definitely well worth the download for a mediocre movie. Thanks for the file.
